description: This file is a header file defining utility functions for filesystem operations including directory creation, file reading/writing, copying, moving, deleting files/directories, and directory listing. It contains type definitions, function prototypes, and comments explaining their purposes.

methods.name: mkdir_p
methods.description: Creates all directories in the specified path with given permissions.

methods.name: readFileContents
methods.description: Reads the entire contents of a file into a newly allocated string. Caller must free.

methods.name: readFileContentsWithTrim
methods.description: Reads file contents and trims an extra newline character if present. Caller must free.

methods.name: writeContentsToFileName
methods.description: Writes given contents to a file, creating or overwriting as needed.

methods.name: copyFile
methods.description: Copies data from source FILE stream to destination FILE stream.

methods.name: copyFileByPath
methods.description: Copies a file from source path to destination path.

methods.name: moveFile
methods.description: Moves or renames a file across filesystems.

methods.name: doesNonEmptyFileExist
methods.description: Checks if a file exists and has size greater than zero.

methods.name: listDirectory
methods.description: Lists and handles all entries in a directory, possibly recursively.

methods.name: deleteDirectory
methods.description: Recursively deletes a directory and its contents.

methods.name: deleteDirHandler
methods.description: Handles deletion of individual directory entries.

methods.name: copyDirectory
methods.description: Copies a directory and its contents to another location.

methods.name: createMarkerFile
methods.description: Creates a zero-length marker file at the specified path.

ctags.name: directoryHandler
ctags.typeref: typename:int (*)(const char * pathname,const char * dname,unsigned char dtype,void * private)
